name: Compulsive Jousting
description:
Story
You've been a competitive jouster your whole life. Today, you have found the ultimate prize: The Golden Lance! It is powerful enough to defeat its opponents in one go, but at a cost: you must win all of your battles within 10 seconds or it will take you back in time to the start of the battle! Are you up to the challenge?
Controls
Mouse - Click to pick a place to charge to.
Credits
Everything made from scratch by me.
Thanks to Matt and Evan, my best friends IRL who put up with my near-constant Discord group call.
Notes
As per the rules of LD, the source code for the game can be found as a download on the itch page. You're more than welcome to check out the inner workings of my chewing gum and duct-tape engineering.
